SMW Subobject for NormalHigh Alchemy value: 0Examine: A defensive weapon.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Bronze defenderUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Bronze defender.pngWeight: 0.453Value: 1Version anchor: NormalRelease date: 13 June 2006Item ID: 8844

The bronze defender is the weakest defender. It is similar to a dagger, but held in the off-hand in place of a shield. The bronze defender is dropped by cyclopes on the top floor of the Warriors' Guild.

If the player dies below level 20 Wilderness, it will remain in the player's inventory. However, the item will be unusable and must be repaired with 1,000 coins by using the item on Perdu.

The '''bronze defender''' is the weakest [[defender]]. It is similar to a dagger, but held in the off-hand in place of a shield. The bronze defender is dropped by [[Cyclops|cyclopes]] on the top floor of the [[Warriors' Guild]].

If the player dies below level 20 [[Wilderness]], it will remain in the player's inventory. However, the item will be unusable and must be repaired with 1,000 coins by using the item on [[Perdu]].
